scenario_analysis.client_needs_summary: Beta Corp requests a 2-day on-site “Effective Communication Skills” program for 18 junior managers at their TechCity office during the first half of September 2024 (e.g., 9–10 Sep or 11–12 Sep). They indicate a budget of about $4,500 and would like a brief pre-training consultation call.
potential_issues_or_deviations: Budget – Client budget ($4,500) is below LearnWell’s calculated fee of $7,702.50 for 18 participants (Section 2 rates + large-group surcharge + Section 3 travel).
Participant number – Requested 18 participants exceeds the standard maximum of 15 and therefore triggers the 15 % large-group surcharge (Section 2: “Large Group Surcharge”).
Preferred dates – Client’s preferred window (first half of September) conflicts with trainer Dr. Alex Reed’s unavailability 2–13 Sep 2024 (Section 4).
Travel cost – On-site delivery in TechCity requires the client to cover the $400 travel expense (Section 3) which is not mentioned in the client’s stated budget.

negotiation_points.details: Client budget ($4,500) vs. calculated total fee including surcharge and travel ($7,702.50).
Client request for 18 participants exceeds standard maximum (15) and incurs surcharge.
Client’s preferred dates (first half of September) are unavailable for lead facilitator.
Client must cover $400 TechCity travel charge which is not addressed in their budget.

proposed_terms.proposal: Total training fee: $7,702.50 for 18 participants (includes large-group surcharge). 50 % ($3,851.25) deposit due upon contract signing; remaining 50 % due on Day 1. Travel cost of $400 billed as a separate line item. Printed materials optional at $25 per participant upon request.
proposed_terms.supporting_data_reference: Section 2 pricing: Facilitator Daily Rate $2,500 × 2 days = $5,000; Digital Materials $75 × 18 participants = $1,350; Sub-total = $6,350. Large Group Surcharge 15 % for 16–20 participants: $6,350 × 0.15 = $952.50. Total fee = $6,350 + $952.50 = $7,302.50. Section 3 travel: flat $400 TechCity. Payment terms 50 %/50 % (Section 2).

proposed_terms.proposal: LearnWell can accommodate all 18 participants with the 15 % large-group surcharge applied as detailed above.
proposed_terms.supporting_data_reference: Section 2: ‘Large Group Surcharge’ applies to groups 16–20. Client group size 18 falls in this range.

proposed_terms.proposal: Proposed delivery dates: 2024-09-16 to 2024-09-17 (primary) or 2024-09-23 to 2024-09-24 (backup). Both options are consecutive weekdays and fall within September.
proposed_terms.supporting_data_reference: Section 4: Trainer availability shows Dr. Alex Reed AVAILABLE 16–17 Sep, 18–20 Sep, 23–24 Sep, 25–27 Sep; UNAVAILABLE 2–13 Sep.

proposed_terms.proposal: Travel expense to TechCity will be invoiced at the standard flat rate of $400 in addition to the training fee.
proposed_terms.supporting_data_reference: Section 3: ‘Standard Travel Cost Estimate (TechCity): $400’ to be billed separately.
